WELCOME

ALFA PLAZA

AFFORDABLE AND NEAT HOTEL IN TASHKENT

BISMILLAHIR ROHMANIR ROHIM

Book

Are you looking for an affordable but tidy and neat apartment in Tashkent for rent for inexpensive price?

Usually cheap hotels have no facilities and are understood as obscene places. Starly hotels with all the amenities are usually very expensive. But our hotel ALFA PLAZA TASHKENT is clean, comfortable and one of the most affordable hotels in the city. Our rooms have been renovated dizigned by euro standard . There are conditions for ablution and prayer rooms. The showers and toilets are modern and easy to use. There are laundry services. There is free and fastly WiFi. Most rooms have air conditioning. In our kitchen, national and foreign dishes are prepared by qualified chefs. There is duty free a parking lot. There are places to store luggage. Rooms for 1,2,3 and 4 people, as well as for families and children
